python_errors.description: CORS wildcard allows any origin, security vulnerability in production
python_errors.fix: Use specific allowed origins from config: allow_origins=os.getenv('ALLOWED_ORIGINS', '').split(',')

python_errors.description: Improper async/await handling - creating tasks without awaiting them, event loop management issues
python_errors.fix: Use asyncio.run() or properly manage event loop lifecycle. Consider using background tasks.

python_errors.code_snippet: avg_copy_length = sum(copy_lengths) / len(copy_lengths) if copy_lengths else 0
python_errors.description: Division by zero risk if copy_lengths is empty list
python_errors.fix: Already has conditional check, but use explicit check: if len(copy_lengths) > 0 else 0

python_errors.code_snippet: avg_duration = sum(durations) / len(durations) if durations else None
python_errors.description: Division by zero risk if durations is empty
python_errors.fix: Already has conditional, but should be more explicit

python_errors.description: Division by zero if impressions is 0, despite check on line 270
python_errors.fix: Move calculation inside the if block: if impressions > 0: actual_ctr = (clicks / impressions) * 100

python_errors.code_snippet: actual_roas = revenue / spend if spend > 0 else 0.0
python_errors.description: Conditional division, but should validate spend is not None first
python_errors.fix: Add None check: actual_roas = revenue / spend if spend and spend > 0 else 0.0

python_errors.fix: Check should be: if predicted_ctr is not None and actuals.actual_ctr > 0:

python_errors.description: Division by zero if actuals.actual_roas is 0
python_errors.fix: Check should be: if predicted_roas is not None and actuals.actual_roas > 0:

python_errors.fix: Move calculation inside if block or use: success_rate = ... if self.stats['total_fetches'] > 0 else 0.0

python_errors.description: Array division, safe but could validate arrays are same length
python_errors.fix: Add assertion: assert len(xgb_importance) == len(lgb_importance)

python_errors.description: Division by zero if predicted_roas is 0, check on line 545 prevents this but unclear
python_errors.fix: Already checked, but make more explicit with elif block

python_errors.fix: No fix needed, properly handled

python_errors.description: Mathematical operation, not a division error but could be clearer
python_errors.fix: No fix needed, safe operation

python_errors.fix: Validate AspectRatio enum values during initialization

python_errors.description: Division by zero if source_h is 0
python_errors.fix: Add validation: if source_h == 0: raise ValueError('Invalid source height')

python_errors.description: Division by zero if target_ratio is 0
python_errors.fix: Validate target_ratio before calculation

python_errors.description: Division by zero if n (len(boxes)) is 0
python_errors.fix: Add check: if n == 0: raise ValueError('Cannot get center of empty box list')

python_errors.code_snippet: avg_x = sum(cr.x for cr in crop_regions) // len(crop_regions)

python_errors.fix: Safe due to check, but could move calculation into if block

python_errors.description: Bare except clause swallows all exceptions including KeyboardInterrupt
python_errors.fix: Use: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Error: {e}')

python_errors.description: Bare except clause in test code suppresses all errors
python_errors.fix: Use specific exception: except Exception: pass

python_errors.description: Bare except clause without logging
python_errors.fix: Log the exception: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Health check failed: {e}'); return False

python_errors.description: Bare except returning default value without logging
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.warning(f'Count failed: {e}'); return 0

python_errors.description: Bare except returning default value
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.warning(f'Count failed: {e}'); return 0

python_errors.description: Bare except returning empty list
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Query failed: {e}'); return []

python_errors.description: Bare except clause without error handling
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Error: {e}'); return None

python_errors.description: Bare except in migration script - dangerous
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Migration step failed: {e}'); raise

python_errors.description: Bare except in websocket handler
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Websocket error: {e}')

python_errors.description: Bare except suppressing batch processing errors
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.error(f'Batch item failed: {e}')

python_errors.description: Bare except on same line - suppresses errors
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.warning(f'Cleanup failed: {e}')

python_errors.description: Bare except suppressing cleanup errors
python_errors.fix: except Exception as e: logger.debug(f'Resource cleanup: {e}')
